Plugin.Details: This plugin finds injection sink and check for its parameters for contamination of user input.

Detector.Details: This detector finds injection sink and check for user contaminated input.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: User input passed into SQL query can cause SQL injection.
BugPattern.LongDescription: {1} executes SQL query from user contaminated value that can cause SQL injection
BugPattern.Details:
This code execute SQL query from user contaminated value. Injected value can read sensitive data from the database, modify database data (Insert/Update/Delete), execute administration operations on the database (such as shutdown the DBMS), recover the content of a given file present on the DBMS file system and in some cases issue commands to the operating system

See SQL Injection on OWASP for more details and preventions.

BugPattern.LongDescription: {1} executes command (shell) from user contaminated value that can cause command/shell injection
BugPattern.Details:
